p: In order to understand the growth inhibitory effect of essential oil, flow cytometry was done to elucidate the DNA cell cycle analysis using PI staining method. The untreated colon HT-29 cells showed 7.69 % of cells in the sub G1 phase ( Figure 3A). When treated with the essential oil of O. viride (0.1 μl/ml), the HT-29 cell population in the sub G1 phase increased significantly up to 78.16% ( Figure 3C) thereby showing more cell death in the sub G1 phase. Drug camptothecin (1μM) was used as positive control to further validate our experiment ( Figure 3B). Accordingly percentage of cell in sub G1 phase has increased on treatment of cells with essential oil ( Figure 3D).
